targets.description: Target KPIs and commitment thresholds for the edge cap investment maturity programme.

lineage.note: All assets must have lineage and an assigned owner before L3 gate

financialTermCoverage.note: All financial terms (Paid in Full, Partial Payment, Unpaid) must be in Collibra glossary

edgeCap.note: Keep concurrent migrations below 80% of the edge cap limit

backSnap.note: Recovery Point Objective: max 60 min of data loss on rollback

variance.note: Gate CI-005: block stage-4 if any KPI drifts > 10% from baseline
